content.title: ## __Ready to launch your next project?__
content.body: With lots of unique blocks, you can easily build a page without coding. Build your next landing page.

contentItems.title: What is NovaJAM?
contentItems.body: NovaJAM is a multi-purpose Next.js template integrated with headless CMS for landing pages, blog, custom forms, and more. It's built with a focus on ease of use, scalability, and practical functionality, making it unique for fast deployment.

contentItems.title: Does NovaJAM support multiple CMS platforms?
contentItems.body: Yes, NovaJAM currently supports [Contentful](https://www.contentful.com/), [Directus](https://directus.io/) and plans to expand compatibility to additional platforms like [Sanity](https://www.sanity.io/), [Payload](https://payloadcms.com/), and [Storyblok](https://www.storyblok.com/) for flexibility in content management. Besides, You can configure it to fetch data dynamically from your CMS or use static JSON files for enhanced performance.

contentItems.title: Can I customize the design?
contentItems.body: Absolutely! NovaJAM offers customizable SmartSection layouts and styling options, including flexible configurations, so you can adjust each section's appearance based on your needs.

contentItems.title: Is NovaJAM open-source?
contentItems.body: NovaJAMâ€™s core is open-source, with a range of licenses available depending on the intended use. For commercial purposes, a Standard Commercial License is recommended.

contentItems.title: Is there a PRO version of NovaJAM?
contentItems.body: Yes, NovaJAM PRO includes additional features and components, available as a private repository. Itâ€™s designed for advanced use cases and offers exclusive functionalities for complex projects.

contentItems.title: How frequently is NovaJAM updated, and can I expect new features?
contentItems.body: NovaJAM is actively maintained, with regular updates and new features based on community feedback. You can look forward to improvements and integrations over time!

content.body: Havenâ€™t got your answer? [Contact our support now](https://novajam.vercel.app/contact)
